title.narrative: Accountable Democratic Institutions and Systems Strengthening Project

description.narrative: (Ghana): The activity is being implemented through building civil society capacity to lobby Parliament for legislative change and citizen advocacy for stronger anti-corruption efforts in the public sphere, including the prosecution of corrupt officials. In this respect the activity works with civil society organizations to strengthen anti-corruption campaign planning and management, investigative journalism, lobbying and advocacy for legislative change. Additionally the activity conducts surveys and public education and awareness programs on the impact of corruption on national development, tracks the performance of transparency and anti-corruption laws and supports a system for citizens to report public sector corruption.

participating-org.narrative: Cooperative for Assistance and Relief Everywhere
